explanation: Funds are required to continue the planned delivery and installation of Persistent Security Surveillance (PSS). The full FY 2011 Joint Urgent Operational Needs (JUON) requirement was split into manageable pieces based on production and delivery schedules, funding availability, and to provide time to analyze what items could be harvested from materiel retrograding from Iraq. This request includes three parts: (1) 24 Persistent Threat Detection System (PTDS) contract crews, sustainment costs, and Full Motion Video (FMV) Dissemination for PTDS. There is a critical need for contract crews for systems procured in FY 2011. (2) Persistent Ground Surveillance Systems (PGSS) components, end-items and integrated support costs. Funding also provides for Dual and Wide-Area sensors, FMV dissemination, improved radar systems, support towers, improved sparing, and training systems. This effort is critical to maintain operational availability rates of 95% as requested by theater. (3) Signal Intelligence (SIGNIT) on PGSS aerostats. Funding provides Commercial-Off-The-Shelf (COTS) and Government-Off-The-Shelf (GOTS) full Persistent Surveillance Surge (PSS) proof-of-concept equipment for 12 PGSS. Funding will support enhanced ISR and force protection to Forward Operating Bases (FOBs) and Combat Outposts (COPs) in Operation Enduring Freedom (OEF). This funding will support JUON CC-0306-M5. This is an acceleration of an unfunded FY 2012 requirement. This is an Overseas Contingency Operations (OCO) requirement. This is a MIP project.

budget_activity_title: Other Base Maintenance and Support Equipment
explanation: Funds are required for the installation of commercial C2 signal interface equipment at an existing government satellite terminal and installation of C2 data connections from a government terminal to a CONUS-based Satellite Operations Center. This will alleviate issues with SALVAREâ€™s commercially-leased satellite C2 uplink solution, which has availability concerns. This is an OCO requirement. This is a MIP project and ISR Task Force Initiative.

Funds are required for development of software algorithms and tools to aggregate and fuse SIGINT data is support of tactical applications to improve capabilities to correlate and fuse SIGINT for MULTI-INT exploitation in support of real-time tactical operations. This is an OCO requirement. This is a MIP project and ISR Task Force Initiative.

budget_title: OPERATION ENDURING FREEDOM depot maintenance reset requirements due to increased
explanation: Funds are available due to lower than forecasted operational requirements for OPERATION ENDURING FREEDOM depot maintenance reset requirements due to increased
